metadata.title: CVE-2015-4646 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
(1) unsquash-1.c, (2) unsquash-2.c, (3) unsquash-3.c, and (4) unsquash-4.cin Squashfs and sasquatch allow remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) via a crafted input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4646` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squashfs-tools - 1:4.3-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squashfs-tools package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.3-3').
